Recorded professional quality video and audio at various events held by the Herberger Institute and performed post-production duties such as picture and audio editing on over 80 projects with a combined running time of approximately 45 hours for delivery to various clients within the university as well as the Herberger Archive. Among this work stands the School of Film, Dance and Theatre's Director's Spotlight Series on which I served as the Lead Editor for seventeen episodes. summary: I am an independent filmmaker and theatre practitioner who specializes in writing, producing and directing new works which push the boundaries of what the arts can be. With a drive for innovative storytelling, I use my craft to shed light on the little-known narratives which shape the world we live in.
